title.narrative: 2019 Explorer Harry Andersen og Søn A/S

description.narrative: Business plan for marketing, selling and constructing designed constructions to the agribusiness sector in Uganda

Danida Innovation & Business Explorer (DIBE) offers financial support to Danish companies, including start-ups, that wish to investigate concrete business opportunities contributing to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris agreement. Harry Andersen is interested in marketing, selling and construct designed construction to the agribusiness sector in Uganda. With this business project Harry Andersen wish to provide access to modern and sustainable construction targeting the agribusiness sector and help the sector to meet the demand for more animal production to the live stock market in general. Adding value not only to the productivity, but also to food security, economic growth and employment in Uganda.
